decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan through hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also applying early pressure with aggressive creatures like Grief and Nethergoyf. The deck also has removal spells like Fatal Push and Toxic Deluge to deal with threats on the board. It aims to control the game's pace and gradually wear down the opponent's resources until it can close out the game with efficient threats and disruption. The Orzhov Midrange archetype combines aggro elements with disruptive spells to create a versatile and powerful strategy.

This deck revolves around utilizing cards that mill your own deck, triggering powerful graveyard-based effects such as bringing back creatures like Bloodghast and Gravecrawler. By rapidly filling up your graveyard, you can quickly bring out strong creatures like Vengevine and Prized Amalgam, overwhelming your opponent with a swarm of creatures. Other cards like Creeping Chill provide additional reach and damage potential. The key strategy is to efficiently mill your own deck while leveraging graveyard synergies to create a formidable battlefield presence and secure victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays and efficient use of the graveyard, utilizing cards like Burning Inquiry and Goblin Lore to quickly fill up the graveyard and cheat out powerful threats like Hollow One and Nethergoyf. Lightning Bolt provides efficient removal while Flameblade Adept and Inti, Seneschal of the Sun put pressure on the opponent. Ox of Agonas can refill the hand and provide a big threat late game. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, powerful creatures and burn spells while maintaining card advantage through graveyard interaction.

The deck revolves around creating a powerful combo using artifacts and spells to generate infinite mana and card draw. It leverages the synergy between cards like Dramatic Reversal, Isochron Scepter, and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to continuously cast spells and generate value. The win condition is to use the generated mana to play powerful artifacts like The One Ring and The Enigma Jewel to overpower the opponent. The deck includes various control elements like Counterspell and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect the combo pieces.

This deck focuses on using a variety of creatures to both control the board and assemble powerful combos. By tutoring for specific creatures with cards like Chord of Calling and Urza's Saga, the deck can adapt to different situations and quickly assemble game-winning combos. Cards like Thassa's Oracle and Malevolent Rumble provide alternate win conditions, while cards like Arboreal Grazer and Wall of Roots help ramp up mana for casting bigger spells. Overall, the deck aims to be versatile and adaptable, utilizing its toolbox of creatures to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Galvanic Discharge to control the board while creatures like Guide of Souls and Ocelot Pride provide consistent damage output. Jegantha, the Wellspring serves as a powerful companion option, while cards like Goblin Bombardment and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury offer additional ways to close out games. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and Static Prison to disrupt opponents' strategies.
